description.p: You have the innate ability to manipulate the weave of time and space itself. To you, timelines and gravity wells are as obvious and natural as the wind or waves. Regardless of the reason, you can manipulate the energy known as dunamis as naturally as one might speak or run.

description.p: At 1st level, you can subtly manipulate the gravity effecting you as a bonus action. You can either make it stronger or weaker.
Stronger. You have advantage on strength ability checks and saving throws and can't be knocked prone. However your movement speed is halved.

Weaker. Your walking speed increases by 10ft, you can jump twice as far and twice as high and difficult terrain doesn't cost additional movement. However you have disadvantage on strength saves or ability checks.
You can end these effects or switch between them as a bonus action

description.p: Starting at 6th level You learn the haste and slow spells. You can cast them using a spell slot or at 3rd level by expending 3 sorcery points. You have advantage on concentration checks with these spells.

description.p: At 6th level, you have advantage on checks to discern illusions and you can't be aged magically.

description.p: At 14th level you can enshroud yourself in a pocket of zero gravity as a bonus action. While the pocket exists you can "fly" at a speed of 30ft per turn and no gravity effects (such as reverse gravity) can effect you. The pocket lasts until you are incapacitated or you dismiss it as a bonus action. Although you can technically fly, it is much closer to a constant falling. For this reason once you are in the air you can't effect your motion unless you have something to push off or some other way of generating a force (such as a loaded crossbow firing)

description.p: At 18th level you can spend an action and 5 sorcery points to meditate on combining multiple timelines in perfect unison. For one hour you gain the following benefits:
You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check, skill check or saving throw that doesn't already include it.
Your charisma increases by 4 to a maximum of 24
This lasts for one hour, or until you are incapacitated. When the effect ends you gain one point of exhaustion
